name: spirally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is shaped in a series of curves, each one above or wider than the one before: For a hundred metres the steps wound spirally up. She was tall and slim, with spirally blonde curls.
More examplesFewer examplesThe sticks were striped spirally in red and white.The leaves are spirally arranged.The main stone stair climbs spirally between two towers.The leaves are narrow, very long and wide, bright to dark green, and spirally twisted.
